name: Death INC
description:
A short little game I made for Weekly Game Jam Week 130! Its kind of a buggy mess, but it's my first solo game jam game so I am proud of it for that!

Length: 15 Minutes at most

Controls: 

Click and drag the player character around to move him. You can also move certain objects by clicking and dragging as well! Use this ability to kill the player character by dropping him into lava!

R is to Restart

Q is to Quit the game

Enjoy!

Music from  Alexandr Zhelanov 

https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxmng6_DMIayDwkiWGVzVRQ?view_as=subscriber
